div1.p: May 20 Transfered to Elias Bates for collection Dollars___________ 2846. Transferred lotts in the Town Herculaneum say lott Number One Number 127 74 75 and 17 also 4 lotts upper end of Town no Number___________._________________________________ 665. Undivided half that part Town Land South Crick Joachim______ 250. _______ 3761. Dolls
Suites pending Courts, Jefferson say Danial Dunklin A Butler S R Wiggins John Findley Walter Frazer—

Amounts Debts and obligations brought over transferred Elias Bates___ 3761. 6 1/2 Claim on Edward Hempstead Estate_____________________________________ 250. 00 do Elihue Mather bond________________________________________________ 150. 00 10. Shares in Bank St Louis which stands in the name of Moses Bates is transfered by Order to Elias Bates—100 Dollars, in cash_______ this Stock is now satisfied to be only worth 60 pr Cent______________ 600. ____________ 4761. 6 1/2
